video_identification.title: Al Ma’in Abu Sitta in 200 years

extracted_metadata.title: Al Ma’in Abu Sitta in 200 years
extracted_metadata.description: Al Ma’in is the birthplace of Salman Abu Sitta. Here is its record for the last 200 years, including its destruction by Israel in 1948 and expelling the family of Abu Sitta, now refugees in Gaza Strip and the rest of the world. But their Right of Return is Sacred, Legal and Feasible. Al Ma’in will be rebuilt as shown here.
